sense.def:
To be superior to something or someone
pomeni, da je oseba ali stvar boljša kot neka druga.

seg.quote: I secretly feel superior to him.
The school prided itself upon its policy of providing a superior education.
...the great superiority of Hoyland over younger abstract painters.

sense.def:
Kdor je
superior to someone else
, ima v določeni organizaciji večje pristojnosti in moč kot nekdo drug.

seg.quote: These matters are better left to someone superior to you.
He was called to the office of a superior to be reprimanded.

sense.def:
Kdor je
superior
, s svojim vedênjem kaže, da je prepričan, da je boljši od drugih.

seg.quote: ‘You wouldn't understand,’ Clarissa said in a superior way.
